word:
The Buildings 

     The sanitarium buildings are fairly well adapted to their present use. They were originally used as a hotel, but have been easily adapted to the sanitarium purposes, though, of course, some changes had to be made. The buildings, with the forty acres of land were purchased for thirty-nine thousand dollars. There was about six thousand 
                                                                           6
dollars' worth of furniture in the buildings, and for this no additional charge was made.
